forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. South wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers after 10am. Mostly cloudy. High near 50, with temperatures falling to around 47 in the afternoon. South wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 1am, then a chance of snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers before 5pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. West wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: All trails power-tilled flat with a classic track and wide skate deck. Conditions are very good.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Skated Coyote from 8 to 10.Softer and more control than Tuesday. Tracks are good with a lot of leaves.

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails were power-tilled and tracked on Tuesday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: The exceptional early season conditions continue today. The temperature should stay just below freezing, making for a comfortable day on the slopes. The snow surface is machine groomed. Pintail Peak opens this Friday. The Big Park opens on Saturday. Lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
